body.name: Pet Hair Removal Broom Rubber Broom, Carpet Rake Fur Remover Broom with Squeegee and Telescoping Handle, Portable Lint Remover, Dog and Cat Hair Remover for Carpets, Couch, Yellow/Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 hrs 27 mins
features: 【SPECIAL EDGE DESIGN】 Not all pet hair removal products are created equal. When cleaning hair from carpets, pull the serrated bristles and the sharp strokes reach deep into the most embedded hairs, bringing the embedded hairs to the carpet surface and collecting them. The serrated bristles easily peel off the collected hairs, saving you time and energy.

【ELECTROSTATIC ADSORPTION】The unique design of this broom combined with the static rubber compound acts like a pet hair magnet. When you brush across the carpet, the bristles of the brush will gain magnetic force and attract the hair to the brush. Clean hairs effectively.

【HANDHELD PET HAIR REMOVER】Handheld rubber brush for easy removal of hair from clothing, car seats and crevices. The rubber bristles are designed to be gentle enough and can also be used on your pet's face to remove debris or work tangles out.

【TELESCOPIC HANDLE】Easily adjust the length of the broom handle to fit any user. The handle can be extended from 36 inches to 60 inches for different heights. It can also be shortened for easy use by children.
【BUILT-IN SQUEEGEE】Built-in waterjet edge helps to clean windows, showers and windshields. Liquid spills on tile, concrete or any hardwood surface can be easily wiped away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does exactly as intended. Love the fact that it’s got the smaller brush with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great to pock up hair
reviews.reviewText: Worked well to get pet hair off carpet. Handle loosened as using so a bit fiddly to get tight. Game changer to get stick pet hair from rug

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does as is stated
reviews.reviewText: This picked up my cat hair like nothing else. Made my job so much easier. Great price for the time it saves you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good at removing hair, but not that easily
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this broom for a couple of months now and overall it does get the job done, works better on short carpets versus long and overall saves my vacuum from getting to tangled with dog hair. However, if you want to remove hair you need to puts some force into it and that is where the trouble with this broom comes in.This broom twists and supposedly locks when you do so the handle stays long but it does not stay at all. Countless of times while i have used it, it shortens and pinches my hands. That is why I'm rating it 3 stars, just wish it could withstand being used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I read the reviews and saw the pictures, but it did not work for us at all. The only thing that happened was the spreading of pet hair. Absolutely no hair was caught up in the bristles. Not worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's very easy to use and very effective at picking up all types of hairs. I bought it because I keep finding my and kids hairs all over the house especially in the rug which is hard to clean. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars FULL HONESTY the handle is the killer of this item
reviews.reviewText: Im have to go with**TWO ⭐️⭐️** (very rarely will i waste time on a 2 star reviw and just send the item back but there was ONE PART i wanted to keep) I will start with why it's a 2 star then maybe talk about the good....THE HANDLE LOCKING AMD THREADS pure junk and everyone knows a bad handle on a broom makes the whole thing worthless (unless rigged up) at first it seemed WOW this is strong till you use it the thing will instantly unlock at 1 or 2 two points (not fun when your not expecting it) make sure everything is snug (not over tight then it would fully break) push push one handed lightly BAM handle collapse AGAIN....issue the threading or the way the head is thread on is just D**B because once you rig the handle (electrical tape) if you even slightly turn with the head on the floor it's coming right off that's enough right there now for the good IT WORKS when sturdy to use silicone is PERFECT squeegee is a game charger the mop thing is iffy might been great if they gave you just one cloth or told the size everything but the handle is very nice and the best part the mini brush I useit EVERYDAY even if I really don't have to I just love it that's why I kept it and doing a 2**......shhhhh I did pick one up from ☕️🐄 6$ and 10000x better unbelievable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Due to the price of this product, I was surprised but, happy and extremely satisfied with this product. First, the packaging was sturdy and carefully packed. It has super multiple usage options. Setting up each section of the handle was perfect. There is no way that it can be connected exempt the right way. I love every aspect of this broom. I appreciate the quality and packaging of the product.
Muy fuerte... no esta que se desarma .
telescopic is not really needed and it does collapse while in use, but overall the sweeper does what it is supposed to do

reviews.reviewTitle: Plastic trash. Avoid at all costs
reviews.reviewText: What a load of trash this item is. Simply doesn't work on any level. Ineffective at cleaning up dog hairs, the telescopic handle doesn't lock vey well, if at all. Avoid buying this cheap plastic ineffective gimmick at all costs
Esta bonita y práctico, el peiné lo ocupo para peinar a mi gato,lo único que no me gusto fue que esta muy dura, pero si cumple su función

My dog is currently shedding Into his winter coat and his allergies are so bad this year his hair is just falling out (don’t worry he’s doing better!) so I got this to help pick up all his fur around the house and it even picks up the small single pieces I can’t see with my naked eye!! I highly recommend it especially because the small piece it comes with is use on clothes and my bed.
